analysis.key_quote: I believe the reclassification of the career civil service employees who participate in the development of funding announcements and oversee the review of grant applications as Schedule F would politicize multiple institutions that have historically been nonpartisan and focused on furthering the public good.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong concerns about the potential politicization of nonpartisan institutions and emphasizes the importance of maintaining a merit-based system and public trust in federally-funded science, which aligns with opposition to the proposed rule.
